title: Women’s basic organic CommerceLab t-shirt
subtitle: Clothing to inspire your shop build
short_desc: The Women’s Basic Organic T-Shirt has a slim fit that perfectly hugs the body and a ribbed collar for extra elasticity and comfort all day long. Your eco-conscious customers will be glad to have another sustainable clothing option in your store.
long_desc:
• 100% organic cotton
  • Fabric weight: 4.57 oz/yd² (155 g/m²)
  • Slim fit
  • Side-seamed construction
  • Round collar with ribbing 
  • Self-fabric neck tape
  • Tear-away tag
  • Enzyme treatment for a soft touch 
  • Download eco-friendly product certificates
  • Blank product sourced from Bangladesh
